articles.description: The US vice-president has suggested "20,000 troops from some random country" will not deter Putin.
articles.title: JD Vance sparks row with Ukraine peacekeeping remarks

articles.description: Packaging inside the box incorrectly states the pills are a different painkiller, aspirin.

articles.title: A23a: World's biggest iceberg runs aground off remote island

articles.description: The court hears Clifford restrained and raped his former girlfriend.

articles.title: Mice experiment as step to create mammoth-like elephants

articles.description: A BBC documentary, The Hunt for Peter Tobin, explains how the murder of a Polish student led to the killer of two other teenagers.

articles.description: Nine-year-old Rami was badly hurt in a strike which killed his brother - now he's learning to walk again.
